definitions.text: something that interests you because it is important or affects you
examples: the safety of the ship is the captain's concern
they hushed it up out of fear of public reaction

definitions.text: a feeling of sympathy for someone or something
examples: She felt strong concern for those less fortunate

definitions.text: something or someone that causes anxiety; a source of unhappiness
examples: New York traffic is a constant concern

definitions.text: a commercial or industrial enterprise and the people who constitute it

examples: There were lots of questions referring to her talk
My remark pertained to your earlier comments
I worry about the second Germanic consonant shift
